DOC.brief_summary: Skin age complex process involve genetic environmental factor . The investigator hope learn human gene function contribute skin age human health .
DOC.brief_title: Human Skin Aging : Clinical Parameters Gene Expression Profiling
DOC.detailed_description: This study include answer survey prior sun exposure , donate two small piece skin ( 4mm ) , one blood draw , complexion analysis , photograph , non-invasive test skin surface lipid analysis . Your blood tissue send DNA analysis gene expression profiling .
DOC.criteria: healthy female , age 18 old , Fitzpatrick type 1 2 skin , able read understand write consent form , body mass index normal overweight range , willing take blood test donate skin sample pregnant lactating , history cosmetic surgery affect face , use prescription antiaging medication 2 week prior study , use dietary supplement 2 week prior study , use tan bed excessive light exposure ( > 2 hour ) past 2 week , medical condition discretion investigator significant impact ability judge subject ' skin characteristic age , sunless tanner use past 2 week
